info.title: Colour Saturation

colour.saturation.description: This Resource describes a Colour saturation value. The Property "colourSaturation" is an integer. A "colourSaturation" has a range of [0,100]. A "colourSaturation" value of 0 means producing black and white images. A "colourSaturation" value of 50 means producing device specific normal colour images. A "colourSaturation" value of 100 means producing device very full colour images.
